text:
Fans are well aware of the on-again/off-again situation between Drake and Rihanna (anyone still shipping a reconciliation?), but she’s not the only lady who has spent time getting cozy with the rapper in one way or another. Jennifer Lopez and Taylor Swift have both taken turns sparking buzz, and now Zoë Kravitz has revealed that she and Drake “hung out for a minute.”

Sitting down for a chat on Watch What Happens Live With Andy Cohen, Kravitz was ready and willing to answer questions from the audience when a caller asked about her rumored relationship with Drake. (The pair were linked back in 2013 after being spotted kissing at a Beyoncé concert.) Staying calm, cool, and collected, she admitted, “We hung out for a minute. Ya know.”

When the host prodded her a little more, she laughed, saying, “We hung out a little bit.” As Cohen waggled his eyebrows suggestively, the actress refused to clarify exactly what was involved during her maybe-fling with Drake.

We may have to accept that we won’t get any more juicy deets about their possible romance, but she did admit, “He’s a cutie.”

Though, if you’re hoping that something might spark between these two in the future, Kravitz told Complex in 2015 that anything folks might have witnessed between them was merely because she’s “very flirtatious.” She added that when it comes to Drake, “He’s family to me.” Too bad. They’d definitely make a cute couple.

Are you surprised that there was once maybe something between Zoë Kravitz and Drake? Let us know @BritandCo!

(h/t Refinery29; photos via Dimitrios Kambouris + David Becker/Getty)

title: Zoë Kravitz Plays Coy About Those Drake Romance Rumors
